title: Resources for Students
content:
Skip to content Search Close Menu Close Academics Research Admissions Campus Life Medicine About Work Here Visit Give SEARCH Resources for Students Student success is a team effort Even the best and brightest students can benefit from the help,
                experience, or guidance of others. Dedicated staff at Rochester
                can help you find and access what you need to succeed. Tradition, ever better Class of 2024: Congratulations on your accomplishments! Commencement Weekend kicks off May 17 with a distinctly Rochester ceremony for all graduates. Celebrations continue through May 19. #UR2024 Discover Commencement Support and services Students will find the help and support they need through a wide
              range of University services. Services by school Each academic unit at the University offers a range of services
                to support students. TOP RESOURCES Arts, Sciences & Engineering Eastman School of Music School of Medicine and Dentistry School of Nursing Simon Business School (intranet access only) Warner School of Education University-wide services Here are other helpful student support services available across
                the University.
